values: 笑话；玩笑；俏皮话；滑稽故事；荒唐可笑的人；笑柄；戏谑；诙谐事件；（Joke）乔克（人名）
开玩笑；说笑话；戏谑；打趣；逗乐；幽默地谈论；轻松地谈论；戏弄；取笑；讥笑

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 爱开玩笑的人；家伙；丑角牌

word_group.brief_definition: 开个玩笑；说笑话；开玩笑
经得起玩笑话, 开得起玩笑
严肃的事, 不轻松的事, 困难的事
对（并不好笑的事）以笑（或幽默地）对待；一笑置之
严肃的事；令人担心的事
严肃的事；令人担心的事
好笑话；好的圆场；好的玩笑
使人恶心的玩笑；恶作剧
长期流传的笑话；老笑话

bilingual.target: 我们都听懂了他的笑话。
我写了这个笑话供你娱乐。
他喜欢在课堂上说笑话。

list.abstract: joke，中文含义为玩笑、笑柄等。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, okay, a joke, a joke, lighten the mood.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，讲个笑话轻松一下。

yingyinNormal.en: The legal system is a joke!
yingyinNormal.zh: 法律体系就是个笑话！

yingyinNormal.en: You are not allowed to laugh at my joke.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的笑话不准你笑。

yingyinNormal.en: So, you stole my joke, and you stole my money.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你偷我的笑话，还偷我的钱。

yingyinNormal.en: Throw a joke or aside in. It will draw laugh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 讲个笑话，聊点闲话，逗逗观众。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: I guess that joke's only funny in Nebraska.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我猜这笑话只有在内布拉斯加州才会好笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I don't think our relationship is a joke.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不觉得我们的恋爱关系是一个笑话。

yingyinNormal.en: It's time for Professor Proton's science joke of the day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在到了质子教授的每日科学笑话栏目。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's clearly a joke. This could easily be true.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那很明显的是个笑话，但是这个很有可能是真的。

yingyinNormal.en: Charlie! A joke. I'm kidding! Just a joke. A joke. Caution, joker at work. Joke. I got it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 查理！开玩笑的！是讲笑话，小心，谐星发威了。笑话，我懂了。

yingyinNormal.en: Dad, Chandler was just laughing at your joke. My joke wasn't funny.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸，钱德是在笑你的笑话。我的笑话又不好笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Why don't you open with a joke? Open with a joke? It's a university, not a comedy club.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不如以笑话开场？以笑话开场？那是大学，不是夜总会。

yingyinNormal.en: Knock, knock. Who's there? Our family is an embarrassment. That's not much of a joke.
yingyinNormal.zh: 咚咚，是谁敲门呀？我们家就是个笑话。这算不上是笑话啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps you never heard the joke, "Why don't birds fly?" I'm gonna tell you why. Because where else would we ever wanna go? Not a good joke.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有个笑话你可能没听过，你们为什么不会飞？我告诉你为什么，因为我们不想去别的地方。好冷的笑话。

yingyinNormal.en: For the love of God. This is a joke, obviously. I'm afraid I don't know what those are, Commander Denniston.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的天呐！显然，这就是个笑话。恐怕我不知道什么是笑话，丹尼斯顿指挥官。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, okay. I heard a joke today. It's pretty funny.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我今天听到一个笑话，真的是挺好笑的。

yingyinNormal.en: That was a joke, or an attempt at one. Next question.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那只是个笑话，或许是曾经有过的尝试，下一个问题。

yingyinNormal.en: When you're on a conviction, that is not a joke, that's what you are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你持有信念。那不是笑话。那就是你。

yingyinNormal.en: It's too soon for a Pearl Harbor joke, perfect time for this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在说珍珠港的笑话还太早，做如厕训练再合适不过了。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, you know that joke you told me last week? The one about Jerry Lewis and the girl with the lazy eye. That slayed me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道你上星期告诉我的笑话吗？杰瑞路易斯跟有惺忪睡眼女生的笑话，那真是笑死我了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a trick played on someone for fun

examination_example.sentence: It has become something of a <highlight>joke</highlight> among Germans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这在德国人中间已经成了一个笑话。

examination_example.sentence: Plagued by long delays, perpetual mismanagement and ever-soaring costs, the airport has become something of a <highlight>joke</highlight> among Germans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 受长期延误、长期管理不善和不断飙升的成本的困扰，该机场已成为德国人的一个笑柄。

examination_example.sentence: Sainsbury's insists that such food is no <highlight>joke</highlight> and could be a new, sustainable source of protein.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 塞恩斯伯里公司坚持认为，这种食物不是开玩笑，可以成为新的、可持续的蛋白质来源。

sense_info_list.en: a person or thing that is ridiculously inadequate

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a trick played on someone for fun

examination_example.sentence: "It started as a <highlight>joke</highlight>," he says with a laugh. "The idea was to put blades on the wheels! You know? Like Ben Hur. Precisely like that, you just go around and run people down."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他笑着说：“这是从一个玩笑开始的，我们原本是想在轮子上安装叶片！你知道吗？像 Ben Hur. Precisely 一样。正是这样，你到处乱跑，把人撞倒了。”

examination_example.sentence: A New Hampshire man's <highlight>joke</highlight> with friends on his wife
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新罕布什尔州的一名男子和朋友开了一个关于他妻子的玩笑。
这是从一个玩笑开始的。

sense_info_list.en: a person or thing that is ridiculously inadequate

exam_freq_info.chinese: 荒唐可笑的人或事; 笑柄; 笑料

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 爱开玩笑的人；大王；小王；伏笔；曲笔；傻瓜；笨蛋

word_family.mean: n. 笑话；玩笑；荒唐可笑的人

examination_example.sentence: Preparing others for a conversation of fun is as good as telling a <highlight>joke</highlight> yourself when showing your sense of humor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在展示你的幽默感时，让别人准备一场有趣的对话就如同你自己讲一个笑话一样好。

examination_example.sentence: Quality counts less than attitude and effort-even stupid <highlight>joke</highlight> can relieve/free others of risk and embarrassment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 质量比态度和努力更重要——即使是愚蠢的笑话也能减轻/免除他人的风险和尴尬。

examination_example.sentence: During the rosy years of elementary school (小学), I enjoyed sharing my dolls and <highlight>jokes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在小学的美好时光里，我喜欢分享我的玩偶和笑话。

examination_example.sentence: They rose in the ranks not by being friendly but by smoking cigarettes, breaking rules and playing <highlight>jokes</highlight> on others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在（学生）地位中上升，方式不是通过待人友善而是通过吸烟、违反规则和嘲弄别人。

sense_info_list.zh: 荒唐可笑的人或事; 笑柄; 笑料

examination_example.sentence: You don't have to be the <highlight>joke</highlight> teller in the group in order to show your sense of humor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不必为了显示你的幽默感而在小组里讲笑话。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 笑话；玩笑；荒唐可笑的人

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 开个玩笑；说笑话；开玩笑

examination_example.sentence: My father told me a funny <highlight>joke</highlight> and I can’t stop laughing every time I think of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父亲给我讲了一个有趣的笑话，我每次想起都忍不住笑。

examination_example.sentence: Your best friend is telling you a <highlight>joke</highlight>, but you can't catch it!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你最好的朋友在给你讲笑话，但你听不懂！

examination_example.sentence: The host told a <highlight>joke</highlight> at the party and made the guests laugh a lot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 主持人在聚会上讲了一个笑话，让客人们大笑。

examination_example.sentence: No matter how hard things got, my mom could always <highlight>joke</highlight> about them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管事情变得多么困难，我妈妈总能开它们的玩笑。

examination_example.sentence: Something wet my eyes when he <highlight>joked</highlight> about his trianing years in Korea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他开玩笑说他在韩国的三年时光时，我的眼睛湿润了。
